1.content: Which storyline do you want to go down?
1.title: Storyline

choices: They could not because Grace had left.
They could not because Grace did not want to see me.
11.content:
The crush of my life was the girl that moved into the house next to mine. I was 8 years old when I first saw Grace; she was not the most beautiful girl and one could even say that she was a bit chubby. Of course, at the time, I did not know that she would become a dream (nightmare).

It all started when I was in the fifth grade, 2 years aafter Grace moved into the house next door. We had been friends ever since but I always suspected an alternate motive behind everything she did. It wasn’t until I was 10 years old that it happened. At that point of time, I was one of the taller guys in my class at 5'2", and Grace finally decided to ask me out near the end of the school year.

I tried to subtly put her down, but she kept clinging on the me. Eventually, I had to push her aside and tell her that I only saw her as a friend and that I liked the girl named Ashley in my class more. Hearing this, Grace ran off in a storm of fit and screamed that I would regret not accepting her. I tried to chase after her but my crush Ashley came up to me and started to talk to me so I forgot about Grace. One week later, my mom told me to go ask Grace's mom if they would like to go to the beach together. As you go to their house, Grace's mom answered the door. She was a beautiful and 5'7 tall lady who was still in her 20s. Her husband had left because she did not want to get an abortion so she had been raising Grace alone. She was standing in her 3 inch platforms because she was about to leave for work. When she answered the door, I instantly got a boner staring up at the 5'10" women in heels. When I asked her if they could come to the beach she said that...
11.title: Grace (School)

111.content: "I'm very sorry but Grace has already left for my brother's house. She is going to stay there for 2 years because she got invited to a female athletic sports camp. "Oh.." you said, trying to figure out why Grace will ever leave to do something without telling you. As you left Grace's house, time started to pass, eventually you and Ashley started dating. Suddenly, over the summer of your 7th grade year, Ashley passed away, her body was found with her neck snapped and in a river near the local grocery store. She was so full of life why would anyone want to kill her. The police eventually found a suspect by the name of Richard Holmes and all the proof strayed towards him. However, Richard was dead as well with a gun shell in his head. The police eventually ruled it off as a drunk man trying to get some action, but when it failed he went suicidal. No one noticed that Richard was battered and had his neck broken as well. . .
111.title: She lefted?

1111.content:
The summer lefted you shocked especially by Ashley's death. You guys had been dating for almost 2 years. On the first day of school, you realized that there was a girl in your homeroom class that you didn't recognize. Also the girl was extremely beautiful and was as tall as you at 5'4". However, for the entire semester you never brought up the courage to talk to her, but you did catch her sometimes staring at you. Finally during the second semester, you had two classes with her, language arts and science. Somehow, luckily you were her lab partner, but it was pre-assigned and their was only one lab a semester. However, during the 2nd week you finally found out her name when she came to talk to you.

"Hey, remember me?" The girl said; confused, I looked around to make sure no one else was around me. "Wow, I leave for 2 years and everyone has forgetten about me." She said. No way I thought it couldn’t be her but I just had to confirm it. "Grace?" I asked her, "Bingo." She said smiling. Grace had changed so much that I didn't even recognize her. "I heard about what happened to Ashley, it's such a tragedy." She said. I was almost over Ashley but the mere thought of her again put me into a depressed mood. From that point on, I was barely paying any attention to Grace. Eventually, she lefted after getting my new number.

--------------TIME SKIP---------------


At the end of the year, I had grown another inch and was now taller than Grace. Eventually we started dating for the few weeks we had before Grace was to leave for volleyball camp...



***Both of these choices take place near the end of the summer.***
1111.title: Start of your 8th grade year

11111.content:
I was invited by Grace to attend her volleyball banquet, apparently all of her friends were eager to meet me. On the week before school started, I went to the banquet which was suprisingly close to my home. As I walked in I noticed that it was a rather empty place, only the team and me were there. As I walked into the main hall, all I saw were girls, looking around I couldn't find Grace.

Finally, I decided to ask one of the girls in the middle of the room who looked like she might be a coach. As I walked up to the girl I noticed that she was probably at least 5'8" without the heels, but with her platform wedge heels, she was easily 5'10" or 11". As I reached up to tap her shoulder, she turned around and to my surprise it was Grace. "Oh, hey you made it," Grace said towering over me as she grabbed me by the shoulder and introduced me to her friends.

As I stared up at Grace who had grown over 4 inches during the summer, I started to feel insecure as I backed away from her. I left the party early without saying good-bye to her. However, on the way home I met Ashley's sister. She was only one year younger than Ashley and they looked nearly the same. I instantly fell in love and we started to set up a date...


Grace's POV:

As soon as my boyfriend slipped away, I tried to find him but I saw him leaving. I decided to follow him home and surprise him later.. but that all changed. I saw the girl that looked exactly like that slut I had murdered last year. Something in me snapped when I noticed that my boyfriend has not gotten over her yet. Revenge will be mine. I followed the girl home.


My POV:

As I got home I quickly texted Emily to ask her when she would want to go on a date. She told me to meet her at Winder Park.

You saw Grace strolling throuh the park still in the same outfit from the banquet that you ditched her at. She saw you and walked up towards you and asked "Hey, what are you doing here?" She smiled.

It was a text message from Emily that asked me where I was. I quickly replied that I was leaving because I thought that I was there on the wrong day. At this point Grace was insane as she threw Emily back into the stall and lifted me higher on the wall as she repeatedly smashed my head until I died.

11111112.title: Honesty

"Hey, what are you doing here?" Grace asked. I answered that I was hoping to see her here. Grace smiled and sat down next to me. As I looked towards her I could visibly see that she was taller than me. As shd caught me staring at her she asked if I would like to sit on her lap.

Trying to please her to get her to quickly leave I said sure and got up and sat on her soft lap. 11111113.title: Liar

"Hmm..." I thought, "Am i really in love with Emily or was it just a way to try to regain my lost love?" Eventually, the more I thought about it the more that I saw that I shouldn't be too hasty to fall in love with Emily. So I decided to text back to Emily "I'm sorry, but I cannot be your boyfriend, I already have a girlfriend." I waited for a while but never got a response from Emily. I thought that she must have been really upset with me.

The rest of the summer past fast and I didn't see Grace because I was busy hoping to finish my summer homework. However, near the end of the summer, I heard on the news that a girl had been missing for a while now. It was Emily. The last time she was seen was when they saw her with me. Luckily, I was able to keep up with my studies and I was able to stay on track to go to highschool. I hadn't seen Grace in a while so I decided to text her to ask her to meet me at the local pond where we always used to hang out. choices: Use this chance to run away

d give her some sense of dominance and that she had won. Instead of running home next door, I decided to go into Winder Park while texting Emily "Where are you?" As she lifted me into the air as well she asked me if I was going to tell anyone what happened here. I quickly shook my head no. She smiled and dropped me to the ground.

That night as I got home and laid to sleep all I could see was the girl easily lifting me into the air. Around midnight, I heard a loud bang down in my kitchen. As I got up to go check, all I saw was a streak when I was smacked to the ground by a fist. As I laid there dazed the lights turned on and I saw that it was the girl. She quickly throatlifted me and carried me out of her house. She held me in the air while she carried me to her house.

When we got there she wasn't even tired as she lifted me up and hanged me on a wodden pole. Then she said "You're not going to live, I can't take the risk of you telling anyone." As she pelted my body with strong punches. I had turned into a living punching bag by this middle schooler girl.

Everydsy she would come down and tell me about her old crush who she met at school that day and what happened while punching me to mush. Eventually, one day she came home mad. She was back from a volleyball banquet and she was carrying an unconscious girl. As she threw that girl to the corner, she walked up to me and cup my chin
She was now the same height as me dangling off the ground by the wodden pole in her heels. She said good-bye as she used her other hand to punch me rapidly fast in in the face as she punched me I blacked out and said my final prayers...
111111321.title: What happened to the taxi driver?

111112.content:
Emily's POV:

As I walked towards my home I decided to stop by Winder Park, even though the park was on the opposite side of the city. As I slowly walked up to one of the swings, I heard some footsteps behind me. When I was about to turn around I was grabbed around my throat and lifted into the air dangling. Kicking my legs trying to get free, I turned around and saw a beautiful girl, I recognized her instantly I had seen her around school. It was Grace. As I tried to scream her hands wrapped around my mouth and nose and I blacked out.

I woke up a few hours later, Grace was in the room as well with my phone.. she was texting someone.. who could it be I thought as I suddenly coughed. "Oh you're awake faster than I thought," Grace smiled as she strutted up, she was still in the same outfit from the park. She was much taller than my petite self at 4'11". "Here," Grace said as she grabbed me by my throat, "come up here to talk." Grace lifted me almost a feet into the air by my throat. As I was in the air, Grace said that she was going to trap her boyfriend because she knew he was going to cheat on her. She smirked as she lifted me higher by extending her arm.

"Now be quiet now," Grace said as she started to put pressure on my windpipes. Soon they were crushed as I was stuck in the air kicking my legs. Grace threw me to the corner of the room and walked out. "Have fun." She said cheerfully. I laid there and passed out...
111112.title: Emily's walk home ( Dead End )

1112.content:
Richard's POV:

"YOU'RE FIRED," he spat at Richard. This all started because Brian decided to switch the boss' sandwich with another one that had chili pepper in it. They were both fired that day and they decided to go to the local bar to get drunk and just forget everything that had happened.

It was all going well, they drank for 3 hours straight from 7 to 10. Brian decided to leave early and Richard stayed their for a couple more minutes before getting kicked out by the bartender for "being too drunk." It eventually got violent and Richard was escorted out by the bar guards.

Richard was having a really bad day so he went to his car and pulled out his pistol from the glove box. He was going to go rob the place. However, across the street Richard saw a young lady who couldn't have been more than a middle schooler walking home at night. In his drunk persona, Richard quickly ran over to try and hit on the girl. After some pestering, the girl eventually started to run. Richard quickly chased after her and caught her.

"Ahhh, the perfect scene the forced sex by the river." Richard thought. As he bent down to pull his pants off, suddenly a bright light shined on him. Another girl had gotten out of the back of a taxi. She was also beautiful just like the girl on the ground but she was much taller, at about 5'4".

"Let her go," the new girl growled. "Why dontcha make me," Richard sneered as he continued. Suddenly he went a jerking motion on the back of his shirt. He was airborne as he was sent flying over the bridge bars dangling for his life. The girl had just lifted him like he was nothing more than a feather. With that Richard tried to pull out his gun but it was no use, the girl saw it and grabbed it from him.

The girl stuck the gun at Richard's headand snapped Richard's neck before putting a bullet through his head. Then she dropped him into the river. "Thank you for saving me!" The girl on the floor exclaimed. As the saver girl took a closer look at the girl she realized that it was Ashley from her class back in elementary school. "Well hello Ashley, the slut, I didn't think I could have my revenge so fa st. " Almost simultaneously Ashley realized that the girl was Grace. "This is for stealing my boyfriend." Grace said as she lifted Ashley into the air, broke her neck and threw her 10 feet into the air where Ashley fell down into the river and died...
1112.title: What really happened...

13.content:
"Yeah!" I thought, "I am finally done with school." With dozens of job offers flowing in, I knew that my future was set for me. As I looked through the offers, one of them particularly caught my eye. It was a job that was only open to guys that were below average height. As I looked at the offer, that one fact intrigued me. The payment for the job was amazing, there was no paycheck but rather a success track. If we made it through the job properly, we would get massive compensation in the form of a fully paid 2 million dollar house, 3 cars, and a hundred million dollar. Although I had the sneaking feeling that it was too good to be true, I decided to give it a chance and meet at the local bar for the initial meeting that night.

3 hours later, I walked into the bar and looked around, and it seemed that there were not much people there. I guessed like me a lot of people thought that it was too good to be true. As I looked around, there couldn't have been more than 30 people there. Out of the whole group, there was only one girl who was sitting in the corner of the room. She was amazingly sexy with her long legs and short dress. I knew that I would probably have no chance with her so I didn't even try. Although, out of the corner of my eye, I kept spying on her and seeing her reject all the guys that tried to hit on her.

"Ahem, may I have your attention," I heard a voice from the center of the room, "it was a man." We all looked towards him as he introduced him. It turns out that he was retiring and the family needed a new butler, and the girl that was sitting in the corner happened to be the eldest daughter of the family. The new butler's task will be to guide the girl and may eventually be allowed to marry her if deemed worthy and in term inherit the family's fortune. Upon hearing this, the majority of the guys in the group starting cheering and started screaming out questions like "What do we have to do?" and "How do we apply?" Although there was also a couple of skeptical guys who were wondering if this was legit. At that the butler handed each of us a stack of hundred dollar bills. We were then told to leave and meet at their mansion 3 days from now after we had enough time to verify if the money was real..


Butler's POV:

"Okay, Miss Katherine I have done exactly as you told me," the butler said. "Good," Katherine replied "I heard all of it myself, now we will see which one of these males will be a proper slave replacement for you my dear butler," as Katherine stood up towering over the butler's measly 5'7". "I guess it is good-bye for you then," Katherine said regretfully as she walked out of the bar leaving the man behind. "Yes, it will be," the man said as he walked towards Euturn Bridge.

Your POV:

The next day you walked to the bank to see if the money was real and it turned out it was. After answering some questions from the bank teller asking you where you got the money and how, you were set free to return home. Three days later you got ready to go to the mansion, you knew that you would have to put up a proper act if you were going to succeed at gaining the job. When you arrived at the mansion, you noticed the signs that pointed towards the interview room, as you followed them towards the room you noticed the line of people waiting to get in. Finally, it was your turn to enter, you were the last one. As soon as you walked through the doors all you saw was the girl from the other day sitting on a throne of a sort with her legs crossed. "Kneel." the girl said emotionlessly.
13.title: Katherine (Mistress)

info.brief_description: Girls in this story are taller and stronger than the guys. They love to humilate men.
info.description:
The story takes place in a unnamed town.
You are a male who is varying in age and circumstances depending on the scenario. In all the scenarios, you are 5'5" tall. The main characters (girls) are much stronger than the guys and they love to dominate them. There are three possible scenarios that can be chosen:

Grace - Classmate
â¢ In this storyline, you are a student at East High School in your junior year. Grace is a girl that you have had a crush on since you were children. This storyline starts during your childhood where Grace actually liked you. But as shr grew older, you weren't tall enough for her so she started to humilate and dominate you. Grace is 5'11" tall with a beautiful face, straight silky hair, and does not have great curves.

Amy and Sarah - Twin Little (big) Sisters
â¢ This storyline will have you the main character being outgrown by your little sisters. When they were little, you would constantly bully them both, but now that you are almost 19, you have pretty much stopped growing. Your sisters are 15 years old and have both blossomed into beautiful ladies. Amy is 5'9" tall and Sarah is 5'7" tall, both of them wear their hairs in a bunch of curls.

Katherine - Mistress
â¢ This storyline will take place in the future when you are about 28 years old. You have just got out of college after 10 years with a doctorate degree and more. However, just when you thought your life was at a peak, you went to a bar late one night and met Katherine. That meeting caused your life to come shattering down before you. Katherine is a 17 year old, 6'3" tall blonde.


Rules:
- Prefer height and strength domination but other stuff such as feet or ass domination works too.
- I reserve the right to edit or delete any entries.
